pr_title: HIVE-23850: Allow PPD when subject is not a column with grouping sets…

timeline.bodyText: Any reason to change the existing test? Could we keep it as-is and add the new ones after that?
timeline.author: jcamachor

replies.bodyText: Fine, I will keep the existing test as it is, and thanks a lot for the review!
replies.author: dengzhhu653
